Class ZReport

java.lang.Object
com.csce331.project2.reports.ZReport
public class ZReport extends Object
Manages Z-Reports which provide end-of-day totals and reset functionality. Z-Reports are run at the end of the day when closing and reset totals to zero. These reports have side effects and should only be run once per day.
Author:
Noble

  • Method Details

    • createZReportPanel

      public JPanel createZReportPanel()
      Creates and returns a JPanel containing the Z-Report interface. Displays end-of-day totals and provides reset functionality.
      Returns:
      a JPanel containing the Z-Report interface

    • generateZReport

      private ZReport.ZReportData generateZReport(String reportDate) throws SQLException
      Generates Z-Report data for the specified date.
      Parameters:
      reportDate - the date to generate the report for (YYYY-MM-DD format)
      Returns:
      ZReportData containing all report information
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there's an error accessing the database

    • resetDailyTotals

      private void resetDailyTotals(String employeeName) throws SQLException
      Resets daily totals and records the reset action. This resets both Z-report and X-report values to zero after generating and displaying.
      Parameters:
      employeeName - the name of the employee performing the reset
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there's an error accessing the database

    • updateSummaryPanel

      private void updateSummaryPanel(JPanel summaryPanel, ZReport.ZReportData reportData)
      Updates the summary panel with report data.
      Parameters:
      summaryPanel - the panel to update
      reportData - the report data to display
